entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:10 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 6:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries mixed with a few local snow squalls this evening and ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
